item.title: Report X-2024080071
item.description:
Report X-2024080071

Identified by scraper @ 2024-08-05T15:15:56+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-07-27
  • City: TUKWILA
  • State: WA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: PLASTIC DRUM WAS DISCOVERED BY AN AUDITOR WHO THEN NOTIFIED A RESPONDER. ALL PPE (GLOVES, GOGGLES, BOOTS, APRON, SILVER LINING) WAS PUT ON AND PLASTIC DRUM WAS PLACED INTO A YELLOW TUB/DMP BAG. PLASTIC DRUM WAS THEN TRANSFERRED TO THE DMP FOR FURTHER PROCESSING. ALL TUBS/PPE WERE THEN DECONTAMINATED AND DRUM WAS FURTHER PROCESSED INTO ETT.
